context: Redfin Corporation is a technology-powered real estate brokerage focused on real estate brokerage, iBuying, and mortgage services. Expanded markets. Mobile app and web tools.

competitors.name: Zillow
competitors.notes: Acquired Trulia for $3.5B, dominant real estate portal

competitors.name: Realtor.com
competitors.notes: Official NAR listings, operated by Move Inc.

competitors.name: Keller Williams
competitors.notes: Largest real estate franchise by agent count

competitors.name: Compass
competitors.notes: Tech-enabled brokerage launching in major markets
